entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet watch test doesn't run tests in dotnet 8 #34949
  • Package validation fail in .NET 8 with Unnecessary suppressions found #34936
    8.0.1xx

Closed

  • dotnet nuget trust command doesn't work in 8.0.0-preview.7 #34610
  • [NETSDKE2E] [Regression]With 8.0.100-rc.1.23414.11 installed, the RID shows incorrectly on Linux Alpine3.18 Arm64 #34627
  • 8.0 SDK contains many assemblies with 6.0/7.0 assembly versions #34245
  • Add a EventPipe test for a native AOT library #34839
    .NET 8.0
  • The directory structure of `sdk-manifests` is changed on .Net8 Preview 7 #34706

PullRequests

Created

  • Add test for PublishSingleFile+PublishAot #34948
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Workload history #34946
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Enable Windows thread pool config switch via Project file #34943
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Razor with renamed compiler DLLs #34928
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update Verify.Xunit to 20.8.0 #34925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Update our TFM support and error messaging for 17.7 #34585
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] [Blazor] Remove hot reload deltas cache #34940
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Test for aot library with eventpipe #34873
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT
  • [Blazor] Remove hot reload deltas cache #34845
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Crossplatform ResourceUpdater #34394
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Add internal _UseManagedNtlm feature switch #34903
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Fix CanSortByDownloadCountAndThenByName test by using CurrentCulture … #34893
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2252819 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Prefer docker tool when both podman and docker are present #34909
    Area-Containers, 8.0.1xx
  • Implement automated cleanup of stage 0 #34693
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'main' #34898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
